name: Build The Brand
description:
Hey there! I wrote a shorty (short story) and made interactive scenes with the narration played in background. There are two scenes the first contains a narrative and can be controlled via mouse. The second is a bit more interactable via WASD. You can't really control a lot, but can sit back and enjoy the environments and story. 

Thank You!

Music at end: 

"Calm Synthesizer, C.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

Other Sounds: 

Freesound - "City streets by Night - Ambient Atmospheres - Sofia, Bulgaria" by vonfleisch

Freesound - "Train under the bridge .wav" by venaportae

Freesound - "Sound of crickets slowed down." by _ylem

Freesound - "Glitch 3" by ceoux
